DOC.brief_summary: The purpose exploratory sub-study evaluate clinical perspective impact disease activity lower dose abatacept 10 mg/kg 5 mg/kg subject achieve remission ( Disease Activity Score 28 [ DAS 28 ] -erythrocyte sedimentation rate [ ESR ] < 2.6 ) Day 701 study IM101023 .
DOC.brief_title: Substudy - Low Dose Abatacept Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Subjects complete main study , willing participate DAS 28 ESR score < 2.6 Day 701 main study
